QuestData.Title: The Bearer of Gnoll-edge
QuestData.Description: I need you to take this back to Mountaineer Kadrell. Show it to him and tell him the nasty critters around here might be having some kind of get-together.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Foreman Sharpsneer's Head to Mountaineer Kadrell.
QuestData.RewardText: Gnolls and kobolds, and troggs? Oh my.$B$BI'd laugh if I didn't have another twist in the story for you.
